show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Obama’s Post-Racial Economy
content:
It will come as no surprise that President Obama will focus on the economy in his State of the Union address tomorrow —... <!--more--> and, specifically, his second-term initiatives to save “the middle class.
” What Obama calls the “middle class,” though, warrants examination.
Why?
Because he’s not talking about two sizable constituencies that put him in the White House — African Americans and Latinos — but are suffering more than all other ethnic groups.
It’s a disturbing pattern, and Leid Stories calls Obama on it.
